'''''má''''' (d. '''mát''', pl. '''máli''') is a [[Quenya]] word meaning "hand".<ref>{{VT|47a}}, p. 6</ref>

==Etymology==
[[PQ]] *''maȝ'', [[root]] [[MAȜ]]<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, entry "[[MAȜ]]"</ref>

==Other forms==
*''máryat'': his/her two hands
*''mannar'': into hands<ref>{{LR|P1III2}}, [[Fíriel's song]], pp. 71-72</ref>
*''mánta'': their hand
**''mántat'': their hands<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 161</ref>

==Examples==
* ''[[Lungumá|Lungu'''má''']]'' = "Heavyhand"
* ''[[Mátengwië|'''má'''tengwië]]'' = "language of the hands"
* ''[[Namárië|ve fanyar '''máryat''' Elentári ortanë]]'' = "has uplifted her hands like clouds"

==See also==
* [[Sindarin]]: ''[[cam]]''
